commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<?php

$id= '';
if(isset($_GET['id']) && is_numeric($_GET['id'])){
   $id = $_GET['id'];
}
if(empty($_GET['id'])){
   die("cet article nexiste pas ");
}
